reviewText: I bought this for my Grandsons Birthday and he just loved it it is just wonderful for a 3 year old.

My 3 yr old is Mickey obsessed and watches it on disney every weekend.  We saw the Mickey Space, and of course he had to have it.  Preordered it and even got a small refund when the price dropped after the release date.  My son watches this almost every evening.

This DVD features a few great Mickey Mouse Clubhouse episodes (one that has never been seen yet on air) and is perfect for any Mickey fan.  My boys love that they can watch Mickey and the gang anytime they want and now anywhere since it comes with a Digital Copy (meaning you can load the disc on your iPad, iPod or mobile device very quickly and easily!)  The episodes are space-themed and there is 70 minutes full of fun plus bonus features!  You can also use the Mickey Mote with this DVD for more fun!

My family has been a fan of Mickey Mouse and in particular Mickey Mouse Clubhouse for some time. This DVD has some great new episodes that are both educational and fun and I can tell you that my girls just loved them! Not only do you get to see your favorite Disney Characters in some funny situations, but you also get to go on some great adventures as well. If you are a fan of Disney, Mickey Mouse, or any of his Disney pals, you will love this new DVD and so will your family!
Thank you
What can i say, kids love mickey mouse!
My daughters love this Mickey Mouse Movie!
My grandson loves Mickey Mouse.
My son cant get enough of this!
wOULD NOT PLAY ON GRAND DAUGHTERS TV
Came in new just as stated.
Good

My son really likes this particular movie the most. I like how it features all the planets and their names. Plus it discusses various features of some of the planets. A very educational and entertaining movie.
Love it!
Would not play the movie. Sent it back got another one same thing.  It would play the previews then when the movie started it was blank.

Ok, my son loves Mickey, especially Mickey Mouse Funhouse.  We purchased several of the DVDs as Christmas gifts.

Much to our surprise, there is no easy way to put the content the DVDs on his Android tablet.... it will only allow you to copy the product to I-devices (must use iTunes), or devices with windows media player installed.  He is turning 3 soon, and I just can't justify purchasing anything other than an inexpensive tablet.  This thing comes with a onetime use download code and some copy protection hocus-pocus that does funky crap to you computer and storage devices.....

I understand why Disney wants to protect their intellectual property, but, they need to remember that the people purchasing the DVDs are trying to do it the right way or they would have just downloaded it via some pirate site in the first place.....so my advice to any Android customers is don't buy this DVD.  I know my saying this will have little or no effect on the empire that is Disney, but, if I save one other person some grief, it will be worth it.
Good
Cute Video!
my grandson will love this he loves mickey
Cute movie for my 2 year old grandson.
my grandsons favorite
very nice

My three year olds enjoy watching Mickey Mouse Clubhouse. However this is the one they ask to watch repeatedly. They act out scenes when playing together. It also peaked their interest in outer space. I just wish there was more than one additional episode on the dvd as some of the other Clubhouse DVDs have 4 episodes, this just has two.
My daughter loves Mickey and really loves these movies. :)
Arrived on time no scratches and great quality.
Grandson adores it.
3 year old favorite!

I have a grandson who absolutely loves Mickey Mouse so I currently have 13 Mickey Mouse DVDs in my collection (mainly so I don't go insane watching the same Mickey Mouse movie over and over with my grandson!).  Normally he is glued to the screen from start to finish for anything Mickey Mouse related he watches; however, this one he walked away from and never came back.  It really was a bit boring.  What can I say?  Sorry Mickey!  We still love you...just not this episode.
Bought this for my daughter.  When playing the dvd in my car it has a very long pause at the beginning.
Grand Daughter Loves the Mickey Mouse Club House "Junior" DVD's. She enjoys watching and it helps her fall asleep at night.
Movie plays well and my grandson loves it... He didn't have this movie so I ordered it and had it shipped to my sons house. The packaging wasn't the greatest but the DVD works fine...

My sons love Mickey's Clubhouse and we own several DVDs that work fine. Despite reading many reviews in which customers complained that this particular DVD didn't work int heir player, I purchased this anyways as it is my son's favorite episode. We have a Panasonic Blu-ray/DVD player that is only a couple of years old - I figured this DVD would work. No such luck - we had the same problem as half of the people who purchased this item. I will be returning this and intend on complaining to Disney about selling a defective product. Also, Amazon should be ashamed for continuing to sell this DVD, as they obviously know it is defective and only works for some people. There is absolutely no reason that it shouldn't work for newer DVD players.

DO NOT BUY. Chances are more than likely that it won't work for you.

My 4 1/2yr old had this movie before but it got scratched. Wouldn't play passed first 5 minutes. This was bought to replace other one. He still loves it. Mommy loves it because it guarantees at least 5 minutes of me time lol.

Gift for my 3 year old granddaughter who is now almost 7.  My memory of this is nil.  6 years ago is when my son came home from Iraq, and he and his wife went to Disney World Florida.  They were sad because their daughter would have loved to see the clubhouse.  Their children stayed home.

This disc only plays on two of the five dvd players that we own.  Will not play in the car, will not play in the portable, will not play in the dvd/tv combo in the child's room.  I've read of this issue with this particular disc and other Disney movies.  Makes me very uncertain about future Disney purchases.  That being said, of course, the four year old loves the movie...when he's able to watch it :(

The content is great.  The problem that I have is that it won't play on my portable DVD player.  I actually sent one back thinking is was broken, but the new one is the same. I then found other reviews saying the same thing.  It works fine on the regular dvd player, but only the previews and second episode play on the portable, not the space adventure.  But that is no big deal.
My kids love it, this is a good movie which so cute & loud too it is funny they love it. Thanks & have a nice day!
Clay loves the DVD. After his second trip to Disney World, he's all about Mickey Mouse and all the others. Thanks. Kathy

Had to return it, still won't work in all portable DVD players, kind of a shame, alot of Disney DVD;s are not friendly to alot of players. TOO sensitive!!! Becomes more of a hinderance and disappointing for the grandchildren when we can't get it to work!

If your children like Mickey Mouse, then they will certainly enjoy this DVD. It includes several episodes so that you can select how long you would like them to watch...perfect for times when 20 mins is just enough.

My daughter loves Mickey and this was the first time we had difficulty with a disk. It didn't play on our Blue-Ray player but we use it on our other disk player and it worked fine. Not sure what the deal is but I read that others had the same problem. Hopefully they fix this issue with future issues.
My grandson is a big fan of Mickey Mouse.  I included this in his Valentine's Day gift and he watches it all the time.
Kids loved it.........good price & shipped on time, they watch over and over... great addition to their collection, will purchase more when they come out

I was so excited for my son who loves Mickey Mouse to watch this DVD because he has seem a clip of it on YouTube. Highly upset that it does not work with my DVD play. I don't know why, never had this problem before
Got this DVD for my grandson's birthday. He really loves it and watches it almost everyday. Would recommend this DVD for any pre-schooler.

Great DVD! Purchased for my grandsons! They love it! The quality of the picture and sound are great! I recommend the Mickey Mouse Clubhouse Series. My grandsons are 2 and almost 4. They love the characters!

My daughter saw this on the Disney channel one day and kept asking to watch Space Mickey. I looked lots of place and Amazon was the only place that had it. Super fast shipping and great price. Made me and my daughter very happy.
My son loves space and loves Mickey Mouse.  This DVD has combined both of his favorite things.  He has watched this countless times.
My daughter loves Mickey and Minnie Mouse.  We watch this all the time. It keeps her attention and mine, aslo.

This DVD looks really cute but the featured movie won't play in our DVD player. The previews play just fine, but the DVD just freezes on a blank screen when the Space Adventure movie should be starting.

Even if the DVD isn't on Fast Play and I have it set to go to the Main Menu, the movie won't play when I select to either have the movie play from the beginning or try to have it start on a different chapter.

I had one copy of Mickey Mouse Clubhouse: Space Adventure--when that didn't work I returned it for a different one. The second one did exactly the same thing. The only explanation is there's something wrong with the coding on the DVD.

We watch a lot of different Disney DVDs and other Mickey Mouse Clubhouse DVDs. This is the first one I've had a problem with.

Son just received this as a gift, but it would not play on his DVD player. On further exploration it appears to be an issue with the portable DVD player. We have a nice Sony portable DVD player (Sony DVP-FX930 9-Inch Portable DVD Player, Black) that has not had an issue with any other DVD in the 3 years we have owned it. Very frustrating. Obviously, if you don't care about the ability to play on a portable player, you would rate this higher, but that is a pretty big deal for us. I see from another review that this is a common problem with this DVD, so it is going back unfortunately.

My son got this for Christmas and he loves it. It's pretty cute, Ive seen it a billion times! there are some cute catchy songs in it, and another short feature follows the mission to mars. it's an episode that has since aired on the disney channel (disney jr.). Overall good movie for mickey fan! He also loved Road Rally, Adventures in Wonderland, and Choo Choo express!

My daughter loves Mickey Mouse Clubhouse and has watched this one over and over again. The best part about this is that it's a continuous movie. It's over an hour, which is awesome! I hate paying for a DVD that only plays for about 30 minutes.

The Mickey Space movie is one of my daughters favorite movies, but we purchased this so she could watch in the car when we traveled.  The problem is it does not work in the portable DVD player.  I even returned the original one purchased and the replacement does not work either.  The previews play, but the cartoon itself will not play.  Every other DVD we have, including all of the other Mickey/Minnie cartoons work on the portable DVD player.  Works fine on the regular DVD player so at least she is able to enjoy it.

this dvd does not work on all dvd players, it sticks in the middle and then starts over. of course this is what i get for being used, but the description said good or excellent condition and the disc is not
Didn't work.
Great entertainment.  So much to see!
My nephew and nieces love these Mickey movies!

My 2 year old loves this movie! Right now she's in to rockets and Mickey... match made in heaven? The movie is fun with all the horrible inaccuracies of animated space travel and disregard of basic physics. It's kind of like a kid's version of Gravity. All-in-all it's a good movie and fun to watch.

Granddaughter; Daddy changed TV service and she doesn't get her Mickey Mouse Club anymore; She loves it and when I popped it in she was in heaven; Dancing around and trying to sing. Can't beat Mickey Mouse for kid's entertainment.
It's mickey mouse
My son loves this movie! It was bought new in the package and works just as it's supposed to.
Fast shipping. ..exactly what we wanted! !
Well, the nieces love it.
